Method Detail

processArgs

public static java.lang.String[] processArgs(java.lang.String[] args,
                                             Config config)
                                      throws java.io.IOException,
                                             ConfigException
Process a set of command line arguments. Config files ("-c" options) will be read and individual config entries ("--x=y" options) will be processed. Unrecognised arguments will be returned in order.

Parameters:
args - The command line options.
config - A Config to populate.
Returns:
All unprocessed options. This will not be null.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading a config file.
ConfigException - If there is a problem processing a config file.
